item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, February 2, 2025 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:

27. The origin and unexpected evolution of the word "mainframe" (124 points | 35 comments)

29. The Doctor Who Drank Infectious Broth and Solved a Medical Mystery (2010) (35 points | 36 comments)
